description: Deletes a specified batch of versions of a table.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The database in the catalog in which the table resides. For Hive compatibility, this name is entirely lowercase.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the table. For Hive compatibility, this name is entirely lowercase.

parameters.name: VersionIds
parameters.description: A list of the IDs of versions to be deleted. A VersionId is a string representation of an integer. Each version is incremented by 1. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: A list of errors encountered while trying to delete the specified table versions.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table in question.

nested_items.name: VersionId
nested_items.description: The ID value of the version in question. A VersionID is a string representation of an integer. Each version is incremented by 1.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with this error.
